name: Rocket Blast (Somewhat Weird Softworks)
description:
Fly through space and collect the stars!

A challenging endless collectathon with quirky animation and 3D graphics. Set in space, you must collect the stars while avoiding the asteroids. I mean, they're bulky, and your ship, well, isn't. So be careful!

Music is made by the talented Eric Matyas, like it was in my previous game. Everything else, is made by me as a part of game development studies.  The high score will be saved if someone wants to challenge you to a battle!

The game doesn't have an "exit to desktop" function yet, but will be added in the future. I really would like honest feedback, since this was my first production after Galaxial Crack Shot.

Thank You and happy gaming!
